code: import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Logo from"../../assets/QQ.png";import Logo_connected from"../../assets/user.png";import Logo_guest from"../../assets/guest.png";import"./Header.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{userData,setUserData}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false);const toggleMenu=()=>setMenuOpen(prev=>!prev);const handleLoginNavigate=()=>{navigate("/login");setMenuOpen(false);};const handleLogout=()=>{if(window.confirm(" 转  砖专爪 转转拽?")){localStorage.removeItem("user");localStorage.removeItem("token");setUserData(null);setMenuOpen(false);navigate("/");}};const handleRegister=()=>{navigate("/register");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\u2699\uFE0F Settings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/"),children:"\uD83C\uDFE0 Back to Home page"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Logo,alt:"QuizQuest Logo",className:"header-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:userData?Logo_connected:Logo_guest,alt:"Profile",className:"profile-button",onClick:toggleMenu}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-menu ".concat(menuOpen?"open":""),children:[!userData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLoginNavigate,children:"Log In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/profile"),children:"My Profile"}),userData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Sign Out"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleRegister,children:"Register"})]})]})]});};export default Header;
